entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The HideContentFromiOSBundleResources must also run for _CollectHotRestartBundleResources #3546
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • GridLayout.RowSpacing is not removed from available space when doing calculations #3545
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • GridLayout.RowSpacing does not trigger hot reload to refresh #3544
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Border loses shape if stroke is 0 #3543
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Deployment error 0700 when building as Windows app #3542
  • Border does not appear when Width/Weight is set #3541
    6.0.200-preview.11

Closed

  • [Bug] Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.Web.WebView2.Wpf.WebView2.add_AcceleratorKeyPressed #2885
    6.0.101-preview.10

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update WebView2 version to 1.0.1020.30 #3540
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix Modal Appearing/Disappearing #3535
  • Setup first set of Automation Properties #3222
    area/a11y
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets need to go into NUPKG #3532
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Move most of the types in the Platform folder to the Platform namespaces #3495
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • [iOS, Windows, Android] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • FlyoutView Handler Android #3513
    area/shell 🐢, area/FlyoutPage
